content.detailedDescription: My son and i saw a black triangle in sky right above us. we were in our pool because it was hot and we couldn't sleep. my son, who was about 11 at the time said "look at that mom, what is that?" he told me to look up and we saw a very quiet, no noise at all, triangle shaped object that blotted out the stars. it was really low, i could see the pine tree tops above it when it went over. it was maybe a hundred or two hundred feet above the power lines. the object looked as it was flowing like flag material in the wind. it is hard to describe. it's path was straight ahead. it moved pretty slow about 10 miles an hour. it went right over our house. when i mention this to my son he doesn't like to talk about it. i think it really scared him. it is nice to hear that maybe somebody else has seen this.  i thought maybe it could have been a hang glider when i thought about it later, trying to make sense of what we saw, but who would be crazy enough to hang glide over power lines at 2 in the morning? i don't remember how we lost sight of it. i think it just kept going the direction it was headed. i think we were in shock. i did drw a picture of what we saw that night to remember.  if i find the drawing i will send it to you.
content.summary: My son and i saw a black triangle in sky

content.detailedDescription: i saw no vehicles on the street.After i got up.  it sounded like a lound buzzing sound.  but only for a couple of seconds, i think.  call it how yow want it, it felt like weird encounter.  can anyone explain it?  i live on a busy street and usually suffer insommnia.  but this was different.  yet explain where 7eral hours went after that noise.  i write this thou it seems only an hour had passed.  i slept well for a while, and then felt i should go outside, too see if it, or they were still were still there.  diid anything else happen in this part of country?
content.summary: Didn't see any oject, rather heard a buzzing sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Place:
iraq(90.11miles n from baghdad)

region:
salah ad din

mark:

during a search/eliminate mission(i will dined).

distance:1mile from my mark,speed:280-286m/h

content.summary: Flybie & land

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i lived on the tonaho odom indian reservation which is south of casa grande,az. at the time i was working as a nurse at the federsl prison in florence approx. an hours drive from home. i had worked late and was coming home at approx. 1 am. about 5 miles after turning onto indian 15 i went through a small canyon. upon exiting the canyon i saw 10 circular lights in the east. they looked somewhat like  the ball flares that are used by the military, but they manovered in a way that ball flares cannot. they zig-zaged , joined in a circle and moved like a snake. i stopped the car and got out to get a better view, and watched the manovers for approx 5 minutes. i then heard a "whooshing " sound and looked to my left. i then saw a red light scanning the desert floor around the mountain. i looked to my right and saw the shadow of what looked like a blackhawk helicopter coming around the mountain. it also had a red laser looking light scanning the desert. my husband is a former marine and i know what a blackhawk looks like, i got into my car and went home. it was almost 3 am when i arrived home which was about 2 hours longer than normal. i only stopped for about 5 minutes and i was only 20 minutes from home what happened?
content.summary: 10 circular objects

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i lived on the tonaho odom indian reservation which is south of casa grande,az. at the time i was working as a nurse at the federsl prison in florence approx. an hours drive from home. i had worked late and was coming home at approx. 1 am. about 5 miles after turning onto indian 15 i went through a small canyon. upon exiting the canyon i saw 10 circular lights in the east. they looked somewhat like  the ball flares that are used by the military, but they manovered in a way that ball flares cannot. they zig-zaged , joined in a circle and moved like a snake. i stopped the car and got out to get a better view, and watched the manovers for approx 5 minutes. i then heard a "whooshing " sound and looked to my left. i then saw a red light scanning the desert floor around the mountain. i looked to my right and saw the shadow of what looked like a blackhawk helicopter coming around the mountain. it also had a red laser looking light scanning the desert. my husband is a former marine and i know what a blackhawk looks like, i got into my car and went home. it was almost 3 am when i arrived home which was about 2 hours longer than normal. i only stopped for about 5 minutes and i was only 20 minutes from home what happened?
content.summary: 10 circular objects

content.detailedDescription: My mom ( 90) and i were going to brenham tex. to see the bluebonnets and take pictures. left houston on 290 heading nw about 15 minutes out from houston. i was driving and off to left above a subdivision( around noon) i said to mom ---look at that plane. after a short time mom said that's not a plane-it's not moving. i said it's probably flying directly toward us. after looking myself i realized it wasn't moving and had a brilliance( like a bright sun reflection) but more brilliant. as drove closer saw it was sort of disc shaped, silver grey in color, had a round like top, edges came to a point. about the size of a 2 engine plane. no sound totally motionless. drove until it was directly to the left of car. then it just blinked out. vanished. if it flew-was too fast to see.  i felt funny while watching this thing. either just before it blinked out or just after i thought i will pull car over and take pictures.  mom had camera in lap and mine in the seat. so weird that we didn't think of that right away. pulled car over.  got out of car with cameras but gone. looked all over in sky and could not see any craft.  day was total sunshine.  possibly my daughter could remember the exact day as she also went to same place to take pictures of flowers.  just thought-  the pictures we took of flowers should have the date.  they are at my mom's , so if needed i could get the date. my daughter took same route and never saw anything. mom used to be the worlds greatest skeptic.  have no idea what it was. the event was very very strange.
content.summary: Disk motionless, silent, brilliant sheen, size of a 2 engine plane, over a subdivision 15 minutes nw of houston on 290 for 10 minutes then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking inside the military base heading to report for duty.Suddenly  something change in the air,everything got silent and by instinct i look straight  above me.It was a black triangle with no lights,size about 60feet wide 40-45feet length.It was traveling very slow(10km/h 6-6.5m/h) at 30 feet above my head,i felt that i could reach out and touch it.

place:
k.E.E.M.(military base)

c.Town:
sparta(greece)

region:
peloponnese

mark:
36*57'35.19" n
22*29'41.64" e
content.summary: Triangle 30feet above me

content.detailedDescription: X-wife spotted stationary orb at chemtrail altitude, then another, drove to home 3 minutes away, grabbed digital camera took some stills, then grabbed video camera and put it on tri-pod and pointed it in general direction of orbs. upon review, orbs were caught on video, popping up out of chemtrail, up, stop, dart up and to the right at unbelievable speed. half hour of video with references, bugs, birds, lens refraction, and two clearly visable orbs, one demonstrating multi directional, unbelievable speed.
content.summary: Orbs visually spotted, then captured with video camera,

content.detailedDescription: i went out to my backyard to have a cigerette. i get alot of airplanes fron tampa & saint pete airport that fly over my house, they are normally very low and make noise.As i stood out back looking up the clouds, that were moving from west to east in large patch's.Comming from above the clouds from the north i saw a large triangle almost the same light gray color as the clouds. i watched it slowly change to the darkness of the sky.By the time it was directly over my house i would have never seen it unless i was looking directly at it. it was a giant triangle about a mile from tip to tip. it had a very dim light on the front. as it went over the stars the stars disapeered. i watched it as far as i could untell it disapeered over the clouds to the south. the time it took from north to south was about three min. very slow moving. i was so shocked on what i just saw, i went into the bedroom where my wife was asleep i woke her up and told her what i saw. i had goose bumps on my arms and my eyes were tearing slightly with excitement. i am 40 years old i have never been sure about ufo's, but finally i know. i know. i am sure what i saw. i know.
content.summary: Transparent triangle about a mile in length, one single/dim light in front.

content.detailedDescription:
A very clear & cold night. no clouds. moon at 2 o'clock position. while stargazing with 10x50 binoculars, i was looking at the orion constelation.
there are three bright double stars spaced apart evenly at an angle. at the bottom of the third set and to the left about 1mm with ruler held at arms length. what i saw was four white flashs of light. each flash was about 30 to 45 seconds apart. the flashes were very noticeable , as if a light switch was turned on and off quickly. each flash was as bright as a 6th magnitude star. each flash was not in the exact same spot, but did slightly move from each previous flash. i could not have seen the flashes without binoculars. i watched for about 30 minutes longer and saw nothing else. it seemed to me to be something in orbit and not millions on miles away. i have seen many satellites pass over in the night sky. this was not passing by but staying rather stationaty.
content.summary: No object. four seperate flashs of light

content.detailedDescription: I have been noticing an amazing event for some time now.  the first time i saw these craft(s) i thought we were being invaded!  i was outside on a cold winter night and happend to look up to see if i could see a meter or satalite and saw the objects.  the objects looked like a satalite moving thru the sky but with change in direction and speed then suddenly stopping a taking off again.  the light of the craft gets brighter as it accelerates in speed.  the speed is fast (horizon to horizon in 5 sec.). estimated to be at 100 to 300 thousand feet in the air (way above conventional aircraft).  the next thing i noticed is that there were more of them. one following the other in a crooked single line fashion from one end of the horizon to the other.  they traveled a few seconds apart from each other. each doing there oun thing.  some did circles in the sky and some look like they were lost up there.  as years (yes. years!) have gone by i kept seeing them. not saying anything to anybody.   they don't stop there daily routine training.  reason i say training is i believe that is what is going on up there. upon watching these things almost daily (mostly at night) and on holidays and weekends , i noticed several strange things take place.  there is a craft that seems to spit them out one right after another.  like tracers out of a gun.  the have other craft that act like bouys to guide them on course and keep them in a type of airial track. these craft have a beacon flash. any of the craft get lost, they flash a beacon. some nights i see experienced pilots operating them doing fantastic displays of airial stunts circles sig saging direct reversal etc. and then the next night see pilots who have no idea how to run the thing.  formations of several can take place and they move across the sky like the blue angels.  i have tried to capture film footage, but special equipment is needed.  one night i tried to count the craft and stopped and gave up at 128.  i think there are more than that, but if it is a course or track i may have counted them several times over.  the course they travel is beyond the horizon to the east and they come form the north usually.  sometimes they have seperate courses.  my house seems to be at the dividing line between the two courses.  if anyone wants to see these things i live near fort mccoy and camp douglas air force base.  they are an amazing craft.  i would like some closure on this issue.  i don't speculate much but i feel someone is definatly hiding something from the public.  i'm pretty confident we are not being invaded.  at least by what i am seeing.  one more thing.  i have almost perfect eyesight and have had a doctor check my eyes several times over with no  problems and i know that what i see is real and i see the ufo's every single night i look up.  back in 2008 football season i went to see the packers play a lambough field in green bay.  i stayed a hotel about 40 minutes away from the statium and happend to look up and i saw them there too.  to be keen on seeing these crafs is to stare at a constellation for a while (2-3 minutes) so to adjust your eyes to the darkness.  stare at the dark part of the sky an soon you will see them come across the sky, note where they cross a star pattern and within a few seconds another will cross the same path.  if you can see the space station cross the sky with your bare eye you can definatly see these things.  they may be above your sky at night as well.  for all i know, across the whole world.  some sighting i have read and know of sound similar to what i see.  i have never seen these crafts up close.  color is only white.  the craft that spits them out i have only seen a couple of times and it appears to be a orange or red color much like a planet would be.  i sometimes mistake them for a star (especially when they are not moving).
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Continous and eventful sightings of ufo's at high altitudes doing training manevours around flashing buoys every single night since 2001

content.detailedDescription: It was my husband's birthday. we were visitng friends who lived in the downtown area,they were sitting on their front step facing south and we were sitting in lawn chairs facing north. out of the corner of my eye something caught my attention. i glanced up at the same instance as my husband and we saw a huge black boomerang shaped object silently glided overhead going in a east to west direction, slighty to the north of our location. there were 5 white lights on the bottom of the craft. the lights were evenly spaced. the object was not shiny but dense. neither my husband or i can approximate the distance between the object and our location. we had no other idea of what the object could have been other than a u.F.O. as it ws unlike anything we have ever seen before. we lost sight of the object in the treeline.The entire event lasted a matter of seconds. we were both in disbelief and didn't say anything to our hosts. later we talked about it and both saw the exact same thing. recently we watched a show that had a video and witness accounts that were identical to what we saw. we are hoping to find some answers as to what we witnessed.
content.summary: Silent, black boomerang glides overhead.

content.detailedDescription: It was my husband's birthday. we were visitng friends who lived in the downtown area,they were sitting on their front step facing south and we were sitting in lawn chairs facing north. out of the corner of my eye something caught my attention. i glanced up at the same instance as my husband and we saw a huge black boomerang shaped object silently glided overhead going in a east to west direction, slighty to the north of our location. there were 5 white lights on the bottom of the craft. the lights were evenly spaced. the object was not shiny but dense. neither my husband or i can approximate the distance between the object and our location. we had no other idea of what the object could have been other than a u.F.O. as it ws unlike anything we have ever seen before. we lost sight of the object in the treeline.The entire event lasted a matter of seconds. we were both in disbelief and didn't say anything to our hosts. later we talked about it and both saw the exact same thing. recently we watched a show that had a video and witness accounts that were identical to what we saw. we are hoping to find some answers as to what we witnessed.
content.summary: Silent, black boomerang glides overhead

content.detailedDescription: I waz in the car with my bro when i looked at him i saw the lights and i told him look at the lights and he did and made a u turn and the lights were their and it waz clear that it waz not a plane it waz not a heilcopter it waz 2 ufos and outher people were looking up at it then i told him lets go i had some fear in me but i know about alot of things i have family in the military i have been around alot of military air craft and it waz not of this earth what i saw
content.summary: 2 oval ufo not moving next 2 each other west of the town

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were in the back yard of our rental home in campbell ca.95008 olympia avenue october 2000 approximately 12:30 am. we had a fire pit with a fire ouy in the back yard. my son jace said to me dad look up. as i did i noticed that just at the top of the tree the sky was blocked above us. a flesh colored object above us blocked the night sky. the texture of the base of the object looked like powder coating or a orange skin. the bottom also was channeled. the object moved forward towards the front yard. we ran through the house yelling to my wife to wake up a ufo was over the house. my son and i stopped at the front of the side walk and street. my son was under the front and i about five feet to the right of the front facing ne. the sub shaped ufo moved forward again slowly at about three miles an hour. this unit continued another 100 foot. the front the started to enter through a worm hole. as the front of the ship drove into and not out of the other side until we watched the tail end disappear into nothingness. at the very moment the ship diapered we looked to the right into the air just above another house an we see the same version of the first sub only a side view. wow !!!. just sitting in the air. i had a perfect view of the entire ufo. the the front shaped like the submarine in the sci fi show sea-view. a tail section flush with the rear and wings about three to four feet long and no tip. within three minutes out of thin air a worm hole. i observed a f-117 fighter appear angle 90 degrees just below the red wood tree line. i thought we would be killed by the crash. the fighter just had enough room to clear the exiting of the worm hole before crashing into the sub ufo. the f-117 did a 90 degree turn and angled out just above the sub. the sub then moved forward eight to ten feet then stopped. the f-117 did the same. then they both moved at the same rate of speed three to five moles an hour to across the street nw. just above dan and georgies house. they stopped above the house together. next the air in a 50x60 foot area in front of the crafts started to look like wavy radiant heat and they both faded away at the same moment. i told dan the next day he laughed. also his neighbor the astronomer he laughed. i love the history channel. i have wanted to document this story for ten years. everyone says do not tell this story.
content.features: Patterned Surface,  Appendage(s),  Louvres,  Wings,  Other
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two submarine air born. one f-117 air born. 75 ft in air. no engines. all not of this world. enter through a worm hole. we saw this.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking some photos in the rising sun in the desert of merzougha in morroc. i just took notice of the object 5 days ago when i was selecting photos. when i saw the photo i thought that was dirt because i had some dirt in my cam but it was different the shape.The color.....And that���������s why im mailing you guys.
 please reply me
thanks......
content.summary: Didn´t saw it

content.detailedDescription: From my lounge window i witnessed what firstly appeared to be 2 orange helicopter lights flying over the river clyde towards skelmorlie north ayrshire, but more and more of the lights them seemed to appear. approx 10 lights appeared and did go high into the sky then disappeared. this sighting has been witnessed by many people in the area of skelmorlie and i called my uncle mr frank jack who has managed to get 2 photographs of the even in question. the lights appeared to be to high in the sky for fireworks or even flares but what was also noted that during the event a small aircraft flew under them as it was heading to land at glasgow airport.
content.summary: Approx 10 orange shaped lights appeared sequencly high in the sky and then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was putting a bag into my garbage can in my front yard. it was a very clear warm night so i was looking up at all the stars and i looked towards west, i saw some dim light moving but looked away and then back again. the yellowish blurry light was now about 1 mile away and i thought it was a plane and i started to watch it carefully but since i noticed only yellowish lights it couldn't be a plane and it was moving west (wnw) to east (ese). also it was around 1000 to 1500 feet up and then i noticed two separated yellowish/orange blurry illuminated areas and thought about maybe a helicopter. when it was around 600 feet away, i could see two separate groups of 4 yellowish/orange lights bobbing/wiggling around opaque blob with 2 yellowish/orange lights in the rear of the roundish blob. i then realised this wasn't any helicopter and felt creepy and thought about going back inside but i decided to watch. it was moving silently at about 40 miles an hour just alittle farther then my across the street neighbors backyards. i could see clearly an opaque roundish object maybe 40-60 feet wide and 40-50 long with two separate groups of 4 yellowish/orange lights bobbing/wiggling around and 2 wiggling lights in the rear. i watched for the next minute or two moving steadly, silently, towards to south east, until it was to far to see amoung the city lights.
content.summary: Round jelly/blob 10 orange/yellowish round lights wobbling around silent steady speed

content.detailedDescription:
i had fallen asleep in the family room while watching tv in the recliner chair.  i was awakened by a bright light shinning in the family room from the sliding glass doors. (there are no curtains on this door).
at first i thought i was seeing a full moon, but it seemed to be moving very slowly.  i got up and went over to the door and saw that it was a bright light that was moving very slowly toward my house.  as it got closer i could see blue lights on both sides of the large white light.  the blue lights were several rows of lights, top to bottom, which made a rectangular shape of lights on each side of the big round light.
 
i stepped out on the deck as this object passed over my head.  it was very large, flying very slowly and making a very small humming sound.  not the sound you hear from airplanes.  i was spellbound by the blue lights.  i was raised in wichita kansas, which is the air capital, and i have never seen a plane with all blue lights!!!

i went to the front door and looked at the flying object as it passed over and could see that the body of the object was dark gray in color (or appeared to be)  it also appeared to be triangle in shape with the bright light at the point in front.  the back of the object seemed to indent toward the middle a little.  not exactly boomerang, still with triangle look.

the next day i heard on cbs news tv station that several people in the western states had reported seeing a blue light streak across the skies.  they were told that they had seen a comet streaking across the sky. it was also reported in the news that people in new jersey had seen something in the sky, but they were told it was weather balloons.

the object was flying towards the atlantic ocean or bay.  i live 30 minutes from the atlantic ocean and 20 minutes from  the bay.

i saw a similar object 38 years ago at 5:30 pm on my way home from work.  it was shaped the same and made the same low engine noise, but i did not see the blue lights that time.  i saw square lights all around the object in white.  they looked liked square windows.  but it had the same big round light in the front at the point and the body was shaped the same.  this object also moved very slowly.  in the paper the next day it was reported that several people and reported seeing this object to the police department in millville, nj.

i feel this was a ufo.  i feel the first one was also a ufo. i did not try to take a picture, i was too interested in just looking at the object.  no one believes you anyway, so why try to take a picture.


i don't know what weather balloons look like, but i do know this was not a balloon.  i know what i saw!!!
content.summary: Triangle, indented at back sort of like boomerang shape, but not as much.

content.detailedDescription: Looked up after exiting a shop building at work, i looked up at one of our towers at work and high above i saw 3 white what i thought to be birds but as i watch they wher to high up in the sky, and traveling to fast. i only had about 10 sec. to observe them but i quickly saw them in formation keeping pace together. birds have a lag time to flap their wings in which case they'd fall back alittle. this was my first experience very exciting.
content.summary: At work came out of one building happen to look up and saw 3 objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I looked out my front window of my house this morning at 5:15am pst. in the distance (guessing 15-20 miles) i noticed a strange object the size of a star to the west of bremerton, wa. what caught my eye was the fact that it was giving off a pulsing light. "that's no star!" i said as i went to retrieve my binoculars. through the binoculars i could see red , green, and blue lights rotating around it. i watched it for about 10 minutes, then decided to grab my video camera...But the battery was dead.
so i just watched it through the binoculars for about 30 minutes total until some low level clouds obscured it. then i went back to bed.
it remained motionless the entire time. i know this because i had a reference point (electrical line over the street) in which to observe any movement for the 30 minutes that i saw it. no movement was observed!
content.summary: Multi colored lights rotating around the craft

content.detailedDescription: The night afther my son deied i was coming from city island ,ny  ,with my father and friend in the back seat and my wife in the front with me ,going back to nj. as i was driving there was a reflection of light on my left but i put no attention to it and keeped driving,my wife got a better look and toled me, miguel,that is not a plain and there is when i saw it and keeped getting closer on till it got over my car.I saw the bright rectangular windows all around the craft terning clock wise but inside the blinking light were not ,it was on top of my car and i put my head out,started pointing at it so others could see and all the ligths on it turened off and all i could see now was a small red light on top and started moving away till didn't see it no more.I had family in the car behaind os that saw it to.
content.summary: I never seen one before it made me believe it came so close.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a very undramatic report, actually quite boring due to the lack of information avaliable, the only reason why i am explaining this is because i feel there must be many more people who have had the same encounter and are puzzled by it. the exact date of the encounter is unknown and the duration of the event is unknown.

during the 80s and early 90s i was in the british army in an armoured recce, tank regiment. some time in the 80s i know that i was sitting in the troop rest room adjacant to the tank hangar, i wan't alone there were at least 3 other troop members in the room. i was sat in an old armchair, my first recollection is that we had all seen something very, very unusual to say the least. an event had just taken place in the rest room involving other (lets say beings) and that is all i know. we were all still sat around staring at each other in disbeleif when one of the others said 'you know that none of us are going to remember any of this'.

told you it is boring and uneventful. all i know is that something happened that day, we were all highly trained professional soldiers and not the sort of people who were inclined to panic or hallucinate, not excitable people. i don't know if any of the others have recollections of what happened or even know if they still remember that something took place, none of us ever mentioned the event again. becuase as i say there was only an extremely vague memory that something actually took place so nothing really to talk about.

i expect that most people who actually do encounter something suffer from memory loss and so a large percentage of encounters must go unreported as there is nothing to report. i cannot say if this encounter were extraterrestial or paranormal etc... just something extremely out of the ordinary. i just hope that one day i can remember what it was we saw that day, as i am an extremely sceptial person and immediately assume there is a rational and logical explaination for everything, but i also know that this event wasn't a figment of my imagination.
content.summary: Unknown encounter with an unexplainable entity(ies)

content.detailedDescription: I was playing with my dog in an open field around 12:30 or so in cary, nc. i happened to look up and spotted a twinkle in the sky. i looked with more intensity and spotted 2 spherical objects which seemed to be moving in a cat and mouse way. i knew then that these were not airplanes, bugs, or delusions. one looped quickly around the other and then slowly faded behind the trees in the distance. they seemed to fly completely straight and together after a few seconds of me spotting them. the event lasted very briefly. one object was extremely reflective in that it caught my eye at a very high altitude. i had my phone with a built in camera and took a picture but it was just too high up.
content.summary: I spotted 2 spherical objects extremely high up moving as 1 strangely.

content.detailedDescription: Hello, my name is van and have presently resided in co.Springs co. with my wife chris and son van jr. for going on 6 years now my sighting happened around 10 years ago.Now i want to tell what we saw one night while fishing with my friend and high school buddy bill.At that time we had been residing in fairfield ca.,(less that 3 miles from travis a.F.B.)for around 30 years. i had been fishing these waters since i was a kid. bill and i had been fishing buddy's for about 5 years fishing the montazuma sloughs both days and nights frequently.The boat was bill's and always ran faithfully.One night around 10:00 p.M. we attemped to relocate to another spot but the boat would not start...We thought it was the battery(die-hard out of my 351 bronco) the battery didn't even have one charge for bill's 50 h.P. outboard. i looked up and noticed what seemed to be a aircraft flying at a altitude of about maybe 50 60 thousand feet but really moving. i ask bill what is that as bill and i observed the aircraft bank right at ninety degrees then not 2 seconds into the banking manuver come to a full stop,at the same instance backed up just in time for what appeared to be a shooting star then accelerating into nowhere at the blink of an eye. at this time bill and i heard a thunderous splash very close to the boat, it sounded like a truck hitting the water from a 1,000 feet up. bill attempted to start the boat,it started right away he grabbed his tarus 38 and i grabbed my .45 and we went home. i told my family about and let it go soon after. well about 2 years later i was watching a ufo special on the history channel, and saw my sighting!!! the veiw was was from one of the space shuttles and the person narrating stated that the military had attempted to shoot high altitude rockets(the shooting star that went by when it stopped and backed up).Well i believe that i know where it might have been shot down on public waters. say within 300 yards from where something hit the water at an incredible speed.............. we never saw the second craft,the ufo special showed two(2)craft and two(2) missile,s.We did,nt see any falling objects,but whatever hit the water did so at an incredible speed making it the loudest thing i have ever heard hitting the waters where we were fishing.The waters we were fishing in was between 10-15 feet deep but within 300 yards from where we were fishing the water depth drops off to approx. 324 feet,thats where i beleive the object hit.This area is very secluded there are no roads,no public buildings,and the only access is by boat.What we saw was not a military craft.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: High altitude craft, starlike,no visible characteristics

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking snapshots of old sheldon church between gardens corner and yemassee sc, near beaufort sc around 2pm and blue sky. i made 4 similar photos within one minute. the camera was a 21 megapixel canon mark iii 1ds digital camera / 17-40mm canon l series professional wide angle zoom lens. all photos were taken at the camera's high resolution setting.

i do not recall seeing the unusual white cigar or disc shape when making the photos. i may have seen it but did not actually take note of it at that time. i did see the white shape while reviewing the photos later in the day.  

only one of the four photos in the series, labeled 206i2322.Jpg, showed the unusual white shape. the photo which included the white shape was taken at 1/250 sec. the white shape was cigar or disc like, distance and size unknown, but was certainly up in the sky beyond the tree line, and oriented at 45 degrees. the other three photos, while varying somewhat in focal length and with smaller framed areas, did not show the same white shape. 

in close examination the upper end of the white shape seems to be more pointed than the lower end. when zooming in to maximum there is a very small circle on the top edge near the upper end which i take to be a spec of dust on the camera's sensor.

when i first began to notice the white shape in the photo, it did not seem to be like any cloud i have ever seen. one of my first thoughts was that it could be a ufo with some kind of invisibility camouflage. it has also occurred to me that the object could have been moving so fast that i could not have seen it but at 1/250 of a second shutter speed my camera could record it.
content.summary: White cigar shape at 45 degrees against blue sky - size and distance unknown

content.detailedDescription:
Early evening, sun hasn't set, very few clouds; a friend and i were watching my 20 months old son play when i looked up and saw this brightly lit silvery thing slowy moving from west of the sky towards east-north-east. we were both sitting on swings facing south-west. i asked my friend to look up and see the thing. both of us couldn't fathom what it could be. it made no sound, it was just gliding over and went behind us. its shape was more like a hot-dog bun. as it moved toward north-east we kept looking at it and then the light was still visible from back side as well, it seemed the it was one continuous light surrounding it. it went out of sight because of buildings. 

i know it wasn't any blimp or ballon since blimps don't look silvery or have one long continuous lights surrounding it or a ballon which doesn't move steadily. i just didn't know what it was and it to be a ufo. i came home and told my husband and few other friends and as usual he thought i had seen something else. i even asked the friend who witnessed the incident to descrive the thing.
content.summary: Early evening, sun hasn't set, very few clouds; i looked up and saw this brightly lit thing slowy moving from south-west of the sky towards east-north-east.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading home from college in grand rapids, michigan to jackson, michigan which was where my parents house was at the time to get my car fixed by a mechanic there in town the next day. i was driving by myself, but the cool thing about this event is that my good friend and witness was directly behind me as to give me a ride back home the next day after dropping my car off to be fixed. it was approximately 11 p.M. and as i was heading east near the lake odessa exit on i-96 i saw a yellowish looking light sitting right in the middle of the highway. at first sight it was approximately 1 mile ahead of my car. it was not an overpowering type of light, but was as mentioned a yellowish type of light. i figured it had to be a helicopter hovering very close or even parked on my side of the highway (i-96 is a two lane highway with a median between east and west bound). as i got closer, this light did not move and i remember saying to myself if i keep my 65 mph pace, i am going to run right into this light! i started to decrease my speed as i was now less than 400 feet from this now becoming a distinguishable object. it proceeded to hover off to the right side of the road at a still very low height. as i was now right below this now visable triangle shaped object, it had a series of blue lights around the triangle shape of the object. the actual size of the object approximately filled the two lane highway by the way. my speed at this time was no more than 45 mph as the object hovered to the right of my car. it continued to head to a line of trees that lined a farmer's field near the highway. there was no noise coming from the object at all. the significance of this story is that my buddy traveling behind me witnessed this whole thing and can attest to this event as well. another neat fact of this event is that the closest car heading west across the median slowed down quite a bit as i assume they were observing this object as well. i am just amazed how close i was to this triangle shaped ufo. it is like it wanted to see how close it could get to my car without having to make me stop from literally running right into it. to make this even more descriptive of how close i was, if i had a rock at the closet distance to this object and would have proceeded to stop and get out of my car, i likely could have bounced it right off it with a full out throw. as i proceeded to drive away i continued to observe where the ufo was headed. it now trailed my car as it also continued to make its climb higher into the night sky. i stopped at the first possible rest area and as i got out of my car to talk to my friend about it. i didn't even have to say a word to him as we approached each other and i could tell he observed the whole event as well. to this day we occasionally mention this event as it was such a surreal thing to have witnessed. of course i wish i had been able to capture a photo or video since the close distance i was to this object was incredible. i would have loved to talk to the car that saw this object as it was heading west. they had to be in awe of not only seeing this take place, but to witness from thier angle of how close i was to this ufo. i have always wanted to document this event, so glad to come across this format.
content.summary: Traveling east on i-96 and literally was driving into a light sitting on my side of the interstate

content.detailedDescription:
I was in prairieville louisiana on insurance business on september 09, 2008.  i was taking digital photos of a house that was damaged from hurricane "gustav".  i did not see or hear anything unusual at the time.  a few months later, i was analysing my photos and observed a stange object in the top left corner of one of them.  it was perplexing because i could not explain what it was.  i have posted it on youtube @ http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=xvit2xz26bs

i will attach the original, unedited, unenhanced digital photo for you review.

please let me know your official findings once a conclusion has been made.

thanks.

troy nelsen
content.summary: Daytime ufo sighting in prairieville louisiana on 09-09-08 while working after hurricane gustav hit the area.

content.detailedDescription: Was listening to radioof the (fireballs playing tag among the skyscrapers at unamagional speeds. at 1000 mph' these ufo moved like halograms. newspaper photographers took pictures which showed up ij the san francisco chronicle rhe next day. the chronicle must still have the original photos. i've never seen these pictures on tv?At that time there were so many ufo's in the bay area'they didn't even draw attn you could see them almost ant time of the day.Anything that wasn't an airplane was automaticly called a weatherballoon. the planes at moffett air base even quit chasing the ufo's
content.summary: Fireballs playing tag among san francisco skyscrapers
